696300.name: CRACKHEAD Theme Tune
696300.description:
Track list:
1. Theme Tune 2016 (Greenlight)
2. Theme Tune 2017
3. Theme Tune 2018
4. Multiplayer Tune
5. Not so easy Mode
6. Overdose Mode
7. Level Editor Tune
4. Survival Mode Tune

Total soundrack length:
43 minutes and 5 seconds

Note: The soundtrack will be downloadable as MP3 files within the DLC and will be located in the same directory as the game files. To listen to it, open the music section and play the album CRACKHEAD Theme Tune or (to access the music files) right-click CRACKHEAD in your Steam library and select "Properties". Then select the "Local Files" tab and click the "Browse Local Files" button.
